identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.km-KH: បញ្ចូលអ៊ីមែលដែលអ្នកប្រើសម្រាប់គណនីរបស់អ្នក

identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.pt: Enter the email you use for your account
identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.sv: Enter the email you use for your account
identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.th: ป้อนอีเมลที่คุณใช้สำหรับบัญชีของคุณ
identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.vi: Nhập email bạn sử dụng cho tài khoản của mình
identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.zh-CN: 输入您用于帐户的电子邮箱
identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.zh-TW: 為您的帳戶輸入使用的電子郵件

identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.ar: إذا كان يوجد حساب مرتبط بعنوان بريدك الإلكتروني، فسوف تتسلم رابطًا في صندوق بريدك لإعادة تعيين كلمة مرورك.
identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.bn: আপনার ইমেইল ঠিকানার সাথে কোনো অ্যাকাউন্ট সংযুক্ত থাকলে, আপনি আপনার পাসওয়ার্ড রিসেট করার জন্য আপনার ইনবক্সে একটি লিঙ্ক পাবেন।
identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.de: If there is an account associated with your email address, you’ll receive a link in your inbox to reset your password.
identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.en: If there is an account associated with your email address, you’ll receive a link in your inbox to reset your password.
identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.es: If there is an account associated with your email address, you’ll receive a link in your inbox to reset your password.
identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.fr: If there is an account associated with your email address, you’ll receive a link in your inbox to reset your password.
identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.id: Jika ada akun yang terkait dengan alamat email Anda, Anda akan menerima tautan untuk mengatur ulang kata sandi Anda di kotak masuk.
identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.ja: If there is an account associated with your email address, you’ll receive a link in your inbox to reset your password.
identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.km-KH: ប្រសិនបើមានគណនីដែលបានភ្ជាប់ជាមួយអាសយដ្ឋានអ៊ីមែលរបស់អ្នក អ្នកនឹងទទួលបានតំណនៅក្នុងប្រអប់សាររបស់អ្នក ដើម្បីកំណត់ពាក្យសម្ងាត់របស់អ្នកឡើងវិញ។
identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.ko: If there is an account associated with your email address, you’ll receive a link in your inbox to reset your password.
identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.lo: ຖ້າວ່າມີບັນຊີທີ່ຜູກໄວ້ກັບທີ່ຢູ່ອີເມວຂອງທ່ານ, ທ່ານຈະໄດ້ຮັບລິ້ງເຊື່ອມຕໍ່ໄປຍັງກ່ອງຂໍ້ຄວາມເຂົ້າຂອງທ່ານ ເພື່ອຕັ້ງລະຫັດຜ່ານຂອງທ່ານຄືນໃໝ່.
identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.ms: Jika terdapat akaun dikaitkan dengan alamat e-mel anda, anda akan menerima satu pautan dalam peti masuk untuk mengeset semula kata laluan anda.
identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.my: သင့်အီးမေးလ် လိပ်စာနှင့် ချိတ်ထားသော အကောင့်တစ်ခုရှိပါက သင်သည် သင့်စကားဝှက်ကို ပြန်သတ်မှတ်ရန် သင့်ဝင်စာတွင် လင့်ခ်တစ်ခု လက်ခံရရှိပါမည်။
identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.no: If there is an account associated with your email address, you’ll receive a link in your inbox to reset your password.
identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.pt-BR: Se houver uma conta associada ao seu endereço de e-mail, você receberá um link na sua caixa de entrada para redefinir sua senha.
identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.pt: If there is an account associated with your email address, you’ll receive a link in your inbox to reset your password.
identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.sv: If there is an account associated with your email address, you’ll receive a link in your inbox to reset your password.
identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.th: หากมีบัญชีที่ผูกกับที่อยู่อีเมลของคุรแล้ว คุณจะได้รับลิงก์ในกล่องจดหมายเพื่อรีเซ็ตรหัสผ่าน
identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.ug: ئەگەر ئېلېكترونلۇق خەت ئادرېسىڭىزغا مۇناسىۋەتلىك ھېسابات بولسا ، خەت ساندۇقىڭىزدا ئۇلىنىشنى تاپشۇرۇۋالىسىز.
identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.vi: Nếu có một tài khoản được liên kết với địa chỉ email của bạn, bạn sẽ nhận được một liên kết trong hộp thư đến để đặt lại mật khẩu của mình.
identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.zh-CN: 如果您的电子邮件地址关联有帐户，您将在收件箱中收到用于重置密码的链接。
identity-block.forgot-password-instructi.zh-TW: 如果已有與您電子郵件地址連結的帳戶，您會在收件匣中收到重設密碼的連結。

identity-block.terms-privacy-text.ar: يعني إنشاءك لحساب أنك توافق على شروط الخدمة وتقر بسياسة الخصوصية.
identity-block.terms-privacy-text.bn: একটি অ্যাকাউন্ট তৈরী করে, আপনি পরিষেবার শর্তাবলীতে সম্মত হন এবং আমাদের গোপনীয়তা নীতি স্বীকার করেন।
identity-block.terms-privacy-text.de: Durch die Erstellung eines Kontos stimmen Sie den Nutzungsbedingungen zu und erkennen unsere Datenschutzrichtlinie an.
identity-block.terms-privacy-text.es: Al crear una cuenta, acepta las Condiciones de servicio y reconoce nuestra Política de privacidad .
identity-block.terms-privacy-text.fr: En créant un compte, vous acceptez les Conditions d'utilisation et reconnaissez notre Politique de confidentialité .
identity-block.terms-privacy-text.id: Dengan membuat akun, Anda menyetujui Persyaratan Layanan dan mengakui Kebijakan Privasi kami.
identity-block.terms-privacy-text.ja: アカウントを作成すると、 利用規約に同意し、 プライバシー ポリシーに同意したことになります。
identity-block.terms-privacy-text.km-KH: តាមរយៈការបង្កើតគណនីនេះ អ្នកយល់ព្រមតាម លក្ខខណ្ឌប្រើប្រាស់ និងទទួលស្គាល់ គោលការណ៍ឯកជនភាពរបស់យើង។
identity-block.terms-privacy-text.ko: 계정을 만들면 서비스 약관 에 동의하고 개인정보 보호정책 을 인정하게 됩니다.
identity-block.terms-privacy-text.lo: ຈາກການສ້າງບັນຊີ, ຖືວ່າທ່ານຕົກລົງເຫັນດີກັບ ຂໍ້ກຳນົດໃນການໃຫ້ບໍລິການ ແລະ ຮັບຮູ້ ນະໂຍບາຍຄວາມເປັນສ່ວນຕົວ ຂອງພວກເຮົາແລ້ວ.
identity-block.terms-privacy-text.ms: Dengan mencipta akaun, anda bersetuju dengan Terma Perkhidmatan dan memperakui Dasar Privasi kami.
identity-block.terms-privacy-text.my: အကောင့်ဖွင့်ခြင်းဖြင့် သင်သည် ဝန်ဆောင်မှုဆိုင်ရာ စည်းမျဉ်းများကို သဘောတူပြီး ကျွန်ုပ်တို့၏ ကိုယ်ရေးလုံခြုံမှု မူဝါဒကို လက်ခံရာရောက်သည်။
identity-block.terms-privacy-text.no: Ved å opprette en konto godtar du vilkårene for bruk og erkjenner våre personvernregler .
identity-block.terms-privacy-text.pt-BR: Ao criar uma conta, você concorda com os Termos de Serviço e reconhece nossa Política de Privacidade.
identity-block.terms-privacy-text.pt: Ao criar uma conta, você concorda com os Termos de Serviço e reconhece nossa Política de Privacidade .
identity-block.terms-privacy-text.sv: Genom att skapa ett konto godkänner du användarvillkoren och godkänner vår sekretesspolicy .
identity-block.terms-privacy-text.th: การสร้างบัญชีแสดงว่าคุณยอมรับเงื่อนไขการให้บริการและรับทราบนโยบายความเป็นส่วนตัวของเรา
identity-block.terms-privacy-text.ug: ھېسابات قۇرۇش ئارقىلىق ، سىز مۇلازىمەت شەرتلىرى گە قوشۇلىسىز ھەمدە بىزنىڭ مەخپىيەتلىك تۈزۈمى نى ئېتىراپ قىلىسىز.
identity-block.terms-privacy-text.vi: Bằng cách tạo tài khoản, bạn đồng ý với Điều khoản dịch vụ và thừa nhận Chính sách quyền riêng tư của chúng tôi.
identity-block.terms-privacy-text.zh-CN: 创建帐户即表示您同意服务条款并确认我们的隐私政策。
identity-block.terms-privacy-text.zh-TW: 建立帳戶即表示您同意服務條款並確認我們的隱私權政策。
